scripts.pre-commit: cd api && yarn run pre-commit && cd ../client && yarn run pre-commit
scripts.install-dependencies: yarn && cd api && yarn && cd ../client && yarn
scripts.build: cd api && yarn run build && cd ../client && yarn run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd api && yarn start" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.start:production: cd api && yarn start:production && cd ../client && yarn start:production
